title: Genesis Chapter 34 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 34 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 34:1: "And Dinah the daughter of Leah, which she bare unto ______, went out to see the daughters of the land."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Dinah the daughter of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob, went out to see the daughters of the land."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 34:3: "And his soul clave unto Dinah the daughter of ______, and he loved the damsel, and spake kindly unto the damsel."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And his soul clave unto Dinah the daughter of Jacob, and he loved the damsel, and spake kindly unto the damsel."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 34:9: "And ______ ye marriages with us, and give your daughters unto us, and take our daughters unto you."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And make ye marriages with us, and give your daughters unto us, and take our daughters unto you."
